metadata.dc:author: Gil Gayarre, M
Gutiérrez Acosta, M
Sánchez Martos, J
Espinós Pérez, D
metadata.dc:description: The authors make a revue of the value of mammography as a diagnostic technic for breast cancer, centering their attention in the existence of calcification. Based on data from the literature and on their own experience, they consider mammography to be a useful procedure for screening, allowing an early diagnosis in a significant number of cases.
metadata.dc:title: Significado de las calcificaciones de la glándula mamaria y valor diagnóstico de la mamografía.
[Significance of calcifications of the breast and diagnostic value of mammography].
